name: Lois sur le blasphème au Pakistan, en particulier le cas de Shagufta Kausar et de Shafqat Emmanuel - Blasphemy laws in Pakistan, in particular the case Shagufta Kausar and Shafqat Emmanuel - Blasphemiegesetze in Pakistan, insbesondere der Fall Shagufta Kausar und Shafqat Emmanuel -  - Proposition de résolution
title: Resolution on the blasphemy laws in Pakistan, in particular the case of Shagufta Kausar and Shafqat Emmanuel
